channel.title: Black Mesa Crashes allways at this point
channel.description: Hi Everybody, My Problem is that in the level, where you have to switch on the huge ventilator (by manual override) Black Mesa crashes every time. Is there anything I can do about it? Do you need more Info? I attached the minidump and a screenshot so you can have a idea where I am (hopefully). Best regards JamFX hl2_4104_crash_2012_10_2T6_25_21C0.mdmp (105 KB) ![screenshot1.jpg|690x500](upload://g0qdwzetHuF4bFrwPz7NfvAC02u.jpeg)

item.title: Black Mesa Crashes allways at this point
item.dc:creator: Levellord
item.description:
JamFX:

Go back to a savepoint before you powered up the generator (with Smithers). If you start the generator before the ventilator, the game will crash if the Ventialtor reaches maximum.

I have no savegame from this point.

Read full topic

item.source: Black Mesa Crashes allways at this point

item.title: Black Mesa Crashes allways at this point
item.dc:creator: JamFX
item.description:
Maybe I can add some info.

I have been first at the very lowest wooden door and switched on power first. Than go back to the Venti and turned on the power.
Is this “bad behaviour”? What did we both do wrong, so our black mesa crashes?

I don’t want to start all over and stop there again.

Is anybody out there, who can tell us a solution?

[EDIT 1]
Now I found out something new: I started at somepoint before I have to climb down all the levels at the Rocketlouncher and went directly through the upper door normaly locked by woods. Now I can go to the venti and turn it on and wait till it reaches full power. No crash.

[EDIT 2]
Ok, this is how it goes: Go back to a savepoint before you powered up the generator (with Smithers). If you start the generator before the ventilator, the game will crash if the Ventialtor reaches maximum.

This is a Bug!!! Please fix it somehow.

Best regards and thanks
JamFX

Read full topic
item.source: Black Mesa Crashes allways at this point

Hi Everybody,

My Problem is that in the level, where you have to switch on the huge ventilator (by manual override) Black Mesa crashes every time.
Is there anything I can do about it? Do you need more Info?
I attached the minidump and a screenshot so you can have a idea where I am (hopefully).
